 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַר‎</span>] **verb** ==split, divide== (so [[Ps.74.13|Ps 74:13]] seems to require [but √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פור‎</span> [[BDB#SS|SS]] is possible], compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***split, tear, rend***; perhaps = I.; &gt; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex.</sup> ***shake, quike, citing*** Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shake*** Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִתְפַּרְפַּר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּרְפֵּר‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive absolute*** + **Hithpo\`el**. ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺר הִתְפּוֺרְרָה אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.24.19|Isa 24:19]] ***split or cracked through is the earth*** ([[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Heb.Hpt.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרוק התפרקה‎</span>). **Po\`êl** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺרַרְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.74.13|Ps 74:13]] ***thou*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***didst divide*** the sea.
